text: The Roseanne reboot – which aired on ABC on March 27th to a whopping 18. 2 million viewers – has been met with critical acclaim and a flurry of opinion pieces. The crux of the controversy lies in Roseanne Barr ’ s politics – both from her character and in real life. The divided reception among LGBT viewers falls not just along lines of liberal / conservative viewpoints but also asks questions about the way queerness is represented on television.
